headline: Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL): The Oldest Member of the S&P 500 Dividend Aristocrats
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is included among the 11 Best Dividend Aristocrat Stocks to Invest in Now. Founded in 1806, the company is the oldest among the S&P Dividend Aristocrats. The business traces its origins back to William Colgate, who started a starch, soap, and candle venture on Dutch Street in New York City. Today, the […]

headline: Is Procter & Gamble Set to Shield Earnings From Global Volatility?
summary: PG leans on pricing, cost efficiency, productivity and brand strength to protect margins as global volatility clouds earnings outlook.

headline: Two Less Popular ETFs That Are Better Than SCHD And Perfect For Retirees
summary: With rising uncertainty and market volatility, ETFs offer diversification and stability. Read why JUST and LGLV ETFs are excellent portfolio additions for retirees.
